data.Name: Dimond Saints
data.Description:
9:00PM Doors | 10:00PM Show | 18+ 

Event tickets purchased for shows in The Perplexiplex DO NOT include admission to the Meow Wolf exhibit. If you would like to experience the converged worlds during your visit, exhibit tickets can be purchased separately and are based on availability. 

Dimond Saints return with with the ‘Omens in the Dark’ Tour, celebrating their forthcoming album.  

Their forthcoming album ‘Omens In The Dark’ is an ever-evolving story of light and dark, highs and lows, a search for connection and signs in dissonant times.  A showcasing of the Saints journey to the next chapter in their mysterious quest to bring love thru sound.
 
Since their inception,  the saints have mined minimalist musical landscapes, crafting mystical excursions thirty-thousand leagues deep. Ethereal melodies and sparse, harrowing beats bring forth their macabre stew, pulsating within a heart of darkness. 

Dimond Saints have graced the stages of festivals far and wide from Coachella, Shambhala, Electric Forest, Hulaween, Lightning in a Bottle, Beyond Wonderland and beyond. It is in their live show where this masked duo comes to life. Cathartic, reviving, and otherworldly. 

Turn the lights down and witness the Omens In the Dark in a city near you soon....

data.Name: Dimond Saints
data.Bio: Dimond Saints is an Oakland based duo, that has quickly emerged to push the boundaries of electronic music. Their signature sound drips of passion and deeply resonates with mind body and soul. Their live show is both explosive and soulful, creating a place where heavy bass and angelic melodies collide. The Dimond Saints are on the rise, as they continue on their mission of giving love to the world Read more on Last.fm
